card-desc: Herz how ur xp card look like. Oh and %{profile_cmd} is 4 chosing which style u wanna use, just in case. Kinda like a free card shop, hehe.
changed-card: Ur xp card naw use the style %{style}
changed-error: Oops, a wicked error occurrd during the process ov ur request. Try again later or contact these nice support guys.
config_list:
List ov avaliable opt: %{options}

Use dat `help profile config` cmd 4 + details
invalid-card: Dat style iz no valid. But yop, her's styles u can use: %{cards}
list-cards: Her's da list of cards u can use: %{cards}
missing-attach-files: Oops, I'm missing the Attach Files perms :upside_down:

animated_card.false: Ur xp card iz now static even w/ animated pfp (faster answer yeaaaah)
animated_card.true: Ur xp card will naw b moving if u have an animatd pfp (may be slawer :/)

show_tips.false: U'll no longer get super cool tips from me
show_tips.true: I'll make sure to help u with super cool tips from now

usernames_log.false: U've disallowd the recordering of Ur usr names & nics
usernames_log.true: You've enabld the things taht i do with ur usr names & nicks
